reviews.review_msg: Worst professor ive ever taken. Lacks empathy and doesn't know what hes talking about.

Great person with the right intentions; however, Colin's Bus 345 class is harder than I expected it would be.  The amount you are expected to learn is overwhelming and if taking this class with Colin, it is highly recommended that your overall course load is light.
Hard class due to high level of student knowledge

Good professor, but overloads his students with work. Too hard for most people, difficult class, not recommended unless you have a background in it or would like to become am master of this, but great guy, and a good professor,I recommend taking this class and no other that semester.
